result.eng: The money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ga: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.orig: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiú
result.html: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfadh sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.
result.ponchtml: An t-airgead a fuair mé ní íocfaḋ sé an cíos dom fiúThe money I got wouldn't even pay the rent for me.

result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.html: Cuireadh mhoill bhreise airHe was delayed even further.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ ṁoill ḃreise airHe was delayed even further.

result.eng: Our boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ga: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.orig: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leo
result.html: D'ullmhaigh ár ndornálaithe go dian cé nach raibh traenálaí ar bith leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.
result.ponchtml: D'ullṁaiġ ár ndornálaiṫe go dian cé naċ raiḃ traenálaí ar biṫ leoOur boxers prepared intensively even though they had no trainer with them.

result.ga: Ní oibríonn sé i gceart fiú
result.orig: Ní oibríonn sé i gceart fiú
result.html: Ní oibríonn sé i gceart fiúIt doesn't even work right.
result.ponchtml: Ní oibríonn sé i gceart fiúIt doesn't even work right.

result.eng: I didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé
result.html: Ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair mé an ríoṁṗost tar éis gur ċláraiġ méI didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.

result.eng: He didn't even have a driver's licence.
result.ga: Ní raibh teastas tiomána aige fiú
result.orig: Ní raibh teastas tiomána aige fiú
result.html: Ní raibh teastas tiomána aige fiúHe didn't even have a driver's licence.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ teastas tiomána aige fiúHe didn't even have a driver's licence.

result.eng: I fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.
result.ga: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil
result.orig: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúil
result.html: Thit mé i mo chodladh cé go raibh an scannán an-suimiúilI fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.
result.ponchtml: Ṫit mé i mo ċodlaḋ cé go raiḃ an scannán an-suimiúilI fell asleep even though the film was very interesting.

result.eng: I don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ga: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.orig: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháin
result.html: Ní bhíonn am agam ithe fiú amháinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃíonn am agam iṫe fiú aṁáinI don't have time to even eat breakfast.

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadhI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige ċuile lá den ḃliain Fiú sa ġeiṁreaḋI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.html: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga ḃí dreaċ sollúnta orṫuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.eng: They passed each other at a slow, even pace.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag scoitheadh a chéile go mall tomhasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag scoitheadh a chéile go mall tomhasta
result.html: Bhí siad ag scoitheadh a chéile go mall tomhastaThey passed each other at a slow, even pace.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag scoiṫeaḋ a ċéile go mall toṁastaThey passed each other at a slow, even pace.

result.eng: It seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ga: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.orig: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.html: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċosúil go raiḃ níos mó eitleáin i spéarṫa Ṁeiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.

result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ga: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.orig: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthi
result.html: Ag déanamh gáire nach raibh a fhonn uirthiLaughing even though she didn't want to.
result.ponchtml: Ag déanaṁ gáire naċ raiḃ a ḟonn uirṫiLaughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: Nothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ga: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú
result.orig: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú
result.html: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog ḟéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ga: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.orig: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dó
result.html: Ach ní raibh cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
result.ponchtml: Aċ ní raiḃ cur suas aige dóBut he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}
